name.ja: ゴブリン<ruby>降<rt>こう</rt></ruby><ruby>下<rt>か</rt></ruby><ruby>部<rt>ぶ</rt></ruby><ruby>隊<rt>たい</rt></ruby>

text.en: If this card is Special Summoned from the hand in Attack Position: You can target 1 Effect Monster your opponent controls; change this card to Defense Position, also negate the targeted monster's effects while this card is in face-up Defense Position. If a monster(s) is Special Summoned to your opponent's field while this card is in your GY (except during the Damage Step): You can discard 1 card; add this card to your hand. You can only use each effect of "Goblin Paratrooper Squad" once per turn.
